hero.title: Master English with
hero.subtitle: Aya Mohsen
hero.description: Licensed English educator specializing in General English, Spoken English, and IELTS preparation. American Diploma holder with IELTS 8.5 score, helping students achieve their language learning goals.

servicesPreview.title: Choose Your Learning Path
servicesPreview.subtitle: Whether you're starting your English journey or preparing for IELTS, I have the perfect program for you.
servicesPreview.beginnerDescription: Build strong foundations with grammar, vocabulary, and basic conversation skills.
servicesPreview.intermediateDescription: Develop fluency and confidence in everyday communication and writing.
servicesPreview.advancedDescription: Master complex grammar, idioms, and professional communication skills.
servicesPreview.ieltsDescription: Comprehensive test preparation with proven strategies for all four skills.

about.title: Meet Aya Mohsen
about.description: Licensed English educator specializing in General English, Spoken English, and IELTS preparation. American Diploma holder with IELTS 8.5 score and teaching license from Ain Shams University.

qualifications.title: Qualifications & Certifications
qualifications.subtitle: Academic excellence meets practical teaching experience to deliver exceptional language learning outcomes.

experience.title: Teaching Experience
experience.subtitle: Proven track record of helping students achieve their English learning goals.
experience.successDescription: Students consistently achieve their target band scores
experience.yearsDescription: Extensive experience in online and classroom settings

philosophy.title: My Teaching Philosophy
philosophy.subtitle: Every student is unique, and so should be their learning journey.
philosophy.personalizedDescription: I believe that effective language learning happens when lessons are tailored to individual needs, interests, and learning styles. That's why I take time to understand each student's goals and create customized lesson plans.
philosophy.approach1: Assess individual learning style and pace
philosophy.approach3: Adapt teaching methods to student preferences
philosophy.approach4: Provide regular feedback and progress updates
philosophy.principle1: Build confidence through small, achievable wins
philosophy.principle2: Make learning enjoyable and relevant to real life
philosophy.principle4: Provide consistent support and constructive feedback
philosophy.confidenceDescription: Language learning is a journey that requires patience, practice, and positive reinforcement. I create a supportive environment where students feel comfortable making mistakes and learning from them.
philosophy.ctaDescription: Let's work together to unlock your English potential and achieve your language goals.

cta.title: Ready to Start Your Journey?
cta.subtitle: Let's work together to unlock your English potential and achieve your language goals.

aboutCta.title: Ready to Transform Your English?
aboutCta.subtitle: Join hundreds of successful students and start your journey to English mastery today.

contact.title: Contact Aya Mohsen
contact.subtitle: Have questions about English lessons or IELTS preparation? I'm here to help you succeed in your language learning journey.
contact.sendMessageDescription: Have questions about lessons or want to get started? I'd love to hear from you!
contact.getInTouchDescription: Ready to start your English learning journey? Choose your preferred contact method below.
contact.contactFormDescription: Prefer to send a detailed message? Use the form below and I'll respond via email.
contact.needImmediateDescription: For urgent questions or quick clarifications, WhatsApp is the fastest way to reach me.

form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Tell me about your English learning goals, current level, or any specific questions you have...
form.successMessage: I'll get back to you within 24 hours.
form.errorMessage: Please try again or contact me directly via WhatsApp.

validation.nameMinLength: Name must be at least 2 characters
validation.nameInvalid: Name can only contain letters and spaces
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.messageMinLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

methods.whatsappDescription: Get answers within minutes, not hours

services.title: English Learning Services
services.subtitle: From beginner foundations to advanced fluency and IELTS mastery. Choose the perfect program to achieve your English learning goals.
services.structuredPrograms: Structured programs designed to take you from your current level to confident, fluent English communication.
services.beginnerDescription: Start your English journey with confidence. Perfect for complete beginners or those who need to strengthen their basics.
beginnerFeatures: Basic grammar structures and sentence formation
beginnerOutcomes: Understand and use basic English phrases
Introduce yourself and ask simple questions
services.intermediateDescription: Develop fluency and confidence in everyday communication. Perfect for students ready to take their English to the next level.
intermediateOutcomes: Express opinions and participate in discussions
services.advancedDescription: Achieve near-native fluency and master complex language structures. Ideal for professional and academic purposes.

ielts.title: IELTS Preparation Program
ielts.description: Comprehensive IELTS training with a 95% success rate. Get the score you need for university admission, immigration, or career advancement.
ielts.listeningDescription: Master all four sections of the listening test with proven strategies.
ielts.readingDescription: Develop speed and accuracy for both Academic and General Training.
ielts.writingDescription: Learn to write compelling essays and reports that score high bands.
ielts.speakingDescription: Build confidence and fluency for natural conversation with the examiner.
ielts.testimonialQuote: Thanks to Aya's expert guidance, I improved from Band 6.0 to 8.0 in just 3 months. Her strategies for the Writing and Speaking modules were game-changers!

specialized.title: Specialized Programs
specialized.subtitle: Targeted programs designed for specific goals and professional needs.
specialized.conversationDescription: Improve fluency and confidence in speaking

cta.title: Ready to Begin Your English Journey?
cta.subtitle: Contact me to discuss your goals and find the perfect program for you.
cta.supportText: All programs include personalized lesson plans, progress tracking, and ongoing support.

testimonials.title: What My Students Say
testimonials.subtitle: Real success stories from students who achieved their English learning goals
testimonials.student1Quote: Aya helped me jump from IELTS 5.5 to 7.5 in just two months! Her teaching methods are incredibly effective.
testimonials.student2Quote: Clear explanations and fun lessons. My speaking confidence soared after just a few sessions with Aya.
testimonials.student3Quote: Finally, I understand phrasal verbs! Aya's structured approach made complex grammar simple.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.content1: Welcome to AM Teachings ("we," "our," or "us"). We are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.
introduction.content2: By using our website and services, you consent to the data practices described in this policy.

informationCollection.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollection.personalContent: We may collect the following personal information:
personalItems: Name and contact information (email address, phone number)
Payment information (processed securely through third-party providers)
informationCollection.automaticContent: We automatically collect certain information when you visit our website:
automaticItems: Pages visited and time spent on our website

agreementToTerms.title: 1. Agreement to Terms
agreementToTerms.content1: Welcome to AM Teachings. These Terms of Service ("Terms") govern your use of our website, services, and educational programs. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy.
agreementToTerms.content2: If you do not agree to these Terms, please do not use our services.

serviceDescription.title: 2. Description of Services
serviceDescription.content: AM Teachings provides online English language education and IELTS preparation services, including:
items: IELTS preparation courses and practice sessions
Educational blog content and learning resources
